meanings.definition: A bicycle for two riders, one behind the other.
meanings.sent1: They rode the tandems together in the park.
meanings.sent2: The couple enjoyed cycling on their tandems.
meanings.sent3: The tandems looked like a fun way to travel in pairs.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like tandems, always moving forward together.
meanings.sent5: The tandems glided smoothly along the path, creating a harmonious rhythm.

meanings.definition: A group of two people working together or closely associated.
meanings.sent1: The tandems collaborated on the project successfully.
meanings.sent2: They formed tandems to tackle the challenge.
meanings.sent3: The tandems made a great team, always in sync.
meanings.sent4: Their partnership was like tandems, each supporting the other.
meanings.sent5: The tandems shared ideas seamlessly, enhancing their productivity.

meanings.definition: A two-wheeled carriage drawn by horses harnessed one behind the other.
meanings.sent1: The tandems carried passengers through the countryside.
meanings.sent2: The elegant tandems trotted gracefully down the road.
meanings.sent3: The tandems seemed to be having a conversation with each other.
meanings.sent4: The tandems moved like a synchronized dance, mesmerizing onlookers.
meanings.sent5: The ornate tandems added a touch of nostalgia to the event.
